ROMAN6.original: Use ~INPUT_PREV_WEAPON~ and ~INPUT_NEXT_WEAPON~ to cycle through weapons.
Kill Little Jacob's ~r~enemies.
Get Little Jacob back to the ~y~cafe.
The target icon will indicate the height of your ~y~destination~s~ in relation to you with an up or down arrow.
ROMAN6.translated: 目标图标会通过上下箭头表示~y~目的地~s~相对于你的位置。

ROMAN6.original: You left ~b~Little Jacob~s~ behind, go get him.
ROMAN6.translated: 你把~b~Little Jacob~s~落下了，回去找他。

ROMAN6.original: When locked onto enemies you can switch between targets using ~PAD_RSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~.
ROMAN6.translated: 锁定敌人时，你可以用~PAD_RSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~切换目标。

ROMAN6.original: Go to ~y~Schottler.
Crouch to stay out of sight. Use ~INPUT_DUCK~ to crouch, this will make your aim more accurate.
ROMAN6.translated: 蹲下以不被发现。按~INPUT_DUCK~蹲下，蹲下时瞄准精度更高。

ROMAN6.original: Wait for Little Jacob to get into position.
Press ~INPUT_RELOAD~ or use ~PAD_SIXAXIS_RELOAD~ to reload.
You've been given a pistol.
Hold ~INPUT_AIM~ to lock onto enemies. Press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to fire your weapon.
ROMAN6.translated: 按住~INPUT_AIM~锁定敌人。按下~INPUT_ATTACK~开火。

ROMAN6.original: Press ~INPUT_RELOAD~ to reload.
Go to the ~y~lookout spot.
Any weapon you pick up will go into your weapon inventory.
ROMAN6.translated: 你得到的任何武器都会保存到你的武器栏。

ROMAN6.original: The target icon will indicate the height of the ~r~enemy~s~ in relation to you with an up or down arrow.
ROMAN6.translated: 目标图标会通过上下箭头表示~r~敌人~s~相对于你的位置。

ROMAN6.original: Lose your wanted level.
Use ~PAD_SIXAXIS_RELOAD~ to reload.
Select the weapon Little Jacob gave you.
Go and pick up ~b~Little Jacob.
Stay close to Little Jacob.
~r~Little Jacob is dead.
Press ~INPUT_VEH_HORN~ to sound the horn to get Little Jacob's attention.
Press ~INPUT_DUCK~ while crouched to stand.
Use ~INPUT_FREE_AIM~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to aim at enemies.
Use ~INPUT_AIM~ and ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to aim at enemies. Press ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to fire your weapon.
